item.title: About Customer Portal
item.description:
Below is the Markdown for the proposed heading structure:

Customer Portal Overview link

What is a Customer Portal link

A customer portal (support portal) is a customer-facing self-service hub that enables businesses to operate 24/7. To provide the best customer service, you need to provide all customers with the best information, and even during hours when customer service is unavailable, the LiveAgent customer portal can provide the necessary content.

This enables customers to find answers to their questions and important guides. This means you can operate non-stop, and your business won’t lose customers.

item.title: Building a Customer Portal
item.description:
Customer Portal Overview link

In LiveAgent, you can build a customer portal by combining three types of content: “Knowledge Base (FAQ)”, “User Forums”, and “Feedback”.

For system configuration of the customer portal, please refer to “Basic Customer Portal Settings”.

How to Create a Customer Portal link

From the agent screen, select “Settings” > “Knowledge Base” to display the customer portal management screen. From this screen, you can create articles (content) or files (directories).

item.title: Building a Self-Service Customer Support Environment
item.description:
The Importance of Self-Service Customer Support Environment link

Many customers try to resolve issues on their own before directly contacting support. When customers can resolve more problems through self-service, it reduces concerns and workload for agents (support staff).

Building a self-service customer support portal enables you to provide support outside business hours and streamline responses to frequently asked questions while reducing effort.

Key Customer Support Strategies link

Knowledge Base: Building a 24/7 FAQ Site link

Provide your customers with valuable information you have in the form of FAQs or knowledge bases. Start by simply creating categories where you want to store information, then add as many articles as you like to those categories.

item.title: Can FAQ and contact forms be supported in multiple languages?
item.description:
LiveAgent’s Multi-Language Support link

LiveAgent supports over 30 languages including Japanese, English, and Chinese. Language display for each function needs to be configured separately for each feature.

Default Language Settings link

Set the default language for knowledge base skins (menu display, etc.) and other functions.

【Related Items】Regional and Language Settings

Language Customization for Each Function link

Live Chat link

You can individually configure the language of the chat button and system messages within the chat window. For text input fields, you can enter and display any custom text strings.

item.title: Customer Forum
item.description:
Customer Forum Overview link

Purpose of Forum Feature link

A forum feature where customers can post questions and opinions to each other, enabling both community activation and support load reduction. Tickets are automatically generated when posts are made, and staff can review them as needed.

Support Mechanism link

For example, when a user posts a consultation about “usage” or “troubleshooting” in the forum, not only can other users provide answers, but agents can also step in via tickets when necessary. This enables “self-resolution” support.

item.title: Feedback & Suggestions
item.description:
Overview link

The feedback board is a system that allows customers to easily post opinions and ideas, serving as a feature to leverage customer voices for product improvement.

Main Features link

Feedback Submission link

Install “feedback buttons” on web pages to enable customers to easily submit improvement suggestions and ideas.

Ticket Management link

Customer posts are automatically generated as tickets, allowing staff to immediately review and respond.

Voting System link

Other customers can vote on posts, visualizing which suggestions should be prioritized.

item.title: Internal Knowledge Base
item.description:
What is an Internal Knowledge Base link

A feature that allows you to create employee-exclusive self-service resources by consolidating internal information, guides, and procedure manuals for employees. It contributes to streamlining onboarding and troubleshooting processes.

Benefits of Use link

During new employee training, system changes, or when access to internal know-how is needed, staff members can quickly obtain information by referencing the internal KB. Additionally, using category structures and search functions, anyone can speedily access the information they need.

item.title: Knowledge Base - FAQ
item.description:
Knowledge Base - FAQ Overview link

Knowledge Base is a flexible and powerful feature for building information platforms for customers.

Main Features and Characteristics link

A feature for building customizable information platforms that consolidate articles, forums, feedback boards, and more for customers. Theme and design settings are also flexibly configurable.

Flexible Content Management link

For example, you can organize FAQ articles by category and set images, attachments, and styles for articles as needed. You can also create private internal articles for agents, expanding the scope of information sharing.

item.title: Multi Knowledge Base
item.description:
What is Multi Knowledge Base link

A feature that allows you to independently manage multiple knowledge bases (portals) by product or brand. You can deploy optimized KBs for multiple sites with a single LiveAgent account.

Benefits of Use link

For example, you can build one KB dedicated to Product A and another dedicated to Product B, providing each with designs and URLs tailored to their respective brands. Management is centralized through a common administrative interface, reducing operational overhead.

item.title: Tell me about the Knowledge Base feature
item.description:
Knowledge Base Feature Overview link

The FAQ/Knowledge Base feature built into LiveAgent is a tool for companies and organizations to dramatically improve customer support efficiency. By publishing categorized articles and manuals on the web, it enables clear and understandable information delivery to users.

Key Features link

With powerful search functionality, it promotes user self-service and can significantly reduce the number of inquiries. The main features include:

  • Quick information access through keyword search
  • Article organization by category
  • Intuitive interface compatible with multiple devices
  • Continuous article updates and optimization

Article Positioning link

The article you are currently viewing is a Knowledge Base article. The Knowledge Base functions as a self-support platform for customers to solve problems on their own. Companies can effectively publish frequently asked questions (FAQs), detailed operation manuals, troubleshooting guides, and more.

item.title: Using the Customer Portal's 'My Page'
item.description:
About the Customer Portal’s “My Page” link

The customer portal allows customers to use product/service FAQs (knowledge base), view and reply to their previous inquiries, and provides limited access to internal knowledge base for support agents.

How to Access My Page link

To use the “My Page” feature of the support portal, access it from the “Login” button in the upper right corner of the support portal.

  • For customer use, account registration is required before logging in. Register using the email address used when making inquiries.

item.title: WYSIWYG Editor for Articles
item.description:
WYSIWYG Editor Overview link

A “what you see is what you get” editor for knowledge bases that makes article editing simple for everyone. Create high-quality articles efficiently without specialized knowledge.

Main Features link

For knowledge base article creation, the following features are provided:

  • Intuitive formatting of images and text
  • Flexible use of HTML/CSS
  • Visual article editing
  • Real-time preview

Benefits link

Intuitive Editing Experience link

For example, anyone can easily create new FAQ articles with images or visually arrange links and headings. Since you can edit while viewing the preview, high-quality articles can be published quickly.
